name: PinGoal (lucas.jaouen)
description:
Here is a digital pinball machine brought up to date by offering competitiveness in order to be even more fun to play. You will be 1 vs 1.

Platform : PC with the AQ and PM keys to move the flippers.

Goal : Bring down the most balls in the opposing camp in order to have the most points in the allotted time. Each ball earns 10 points.

Bonus : The bumpers earn 2 points each time they are hit, it's up to you to choose your strategy !

Technologies : Unity, FMOD, Arduino.

Team :

Development : Lucas, William, Landry.

Graphic designer : Sébastian, Kaia.

Game Designer : Ahmet.

Ergonomist: Chris.

My website : https://lucasjaouen.com
